```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
glimpse(sharktank)
```
```{r}
sharktank <- clean_names(sharktank)
names(sharktank)
```

```{r}
structure(sharktank)
```
```{r}
sharktank <- sharktank%>% 
pivot_longer(barbara_corcoran_investment_equity : guest_investment_equity,
      names_to = c("shark", "investment_type"),
    names_sep = "_investment_",
    values_to = "dollars") %>% 
  relocate(shark, investment_type, dollars) %>% 
sharktank
```

```{r}
sharktank <- sharktank %>% 
  filter(investment_type != "equity")

sharktank
```

```{r}
sharktank["dollars"][is.na(sharktank["dollars"])] <- 0 
sharktank
```

```{r}
sharktank <- sharktank %>% 
  mutate(made_deal=ifelse(dollars>0, 1, 0))
sharktank
```

```{r}
sharktank %>% 
  count(shark, made_deal) %>% 
  filter(made_deal==1) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=shark, y= n, fill=shark))+geom_col()
```
```{r}
sharktank %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=shark, fill=shark))+geom_bar()
```



```{r}
sharktank %>% 
  group_by(Industry , ) %>% 
  
```
